tool.name: APSIM 7.5
tool.help:
**What it does**
APSIM (Agricultural Production Systems Simulator) is a farming systems model that simulates the effects of environmental variables and management decisions on crop yield, profits and ecological outcomes. The APSIM 7.5 app uses version 7.5 of the APSIM.
For additional information on APSIM see http://www.apsim.info
